snippet: Archie Comics said that it would publish a four-part story called "Archie Meets Glee," in which characters like Archie, Betty, Veronica and Jughead mix it up with the students of the Fox musical comedy "Glee."
abstract: Archie Comics said that it would publish a four-part story called "Archie Meets Glee," in which characters like Archie, Betty, Veronica and Jughead mix it up with the students of the Fox musical comedy "Glee."

headline.main: Students of 'Glee' and Archie Plan a Comic-Book Mixer
